title: Haunting
description: In this Dateline classic, a pair of double homicides in Nebraska, five years apart, lead police to fear a serial killer may be on the loose. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 17, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
